QuestData.Title: A Message of Blood and Fire
QuestData.Description:
Look at what I be findin' here. Dis one had a magic wand in his hand.
<Rokhan shuts his eyes for a moment.>
Mmmmm... it be warm. Mojo of fire be within. Perfect!
Take dis ting an' give 'em a taste of their own firepower.
Burn da whole village down!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Wand of Embers to set ablaze $1oa Blood Troll huts in Agwamar.
